QuestData.Title: A Worthy Challenge: Xin the Weaponmaster
QuestData.Description: $n, I need you to assemble a nimble group and lead them into Mogu'shan Palace. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and put an end to Xin the Weaponmaster.$B$BReturn to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Mogu'shan Palace Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Objective: Complete the Mogu'shan Palace Challenge Mode
